website.projDesc: This website is one of the projects I've worked on. It's built using React, Material-UI, and Bootstrap. There were a few different goals to making this website. One of the major ones was to help improve my frontend skills to become more of a fullstack developer. Another was to help build out my portfolio of work I could show people. The source code for the project is up on Github: https://github.com/Ututu222/portfolio-website.
